short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight phone numbers and right-click to dial.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The intent of this extension is to allow users to highlight phone numbers that are not formatted as a "tel:" link already, (like this: 123-456-7890) and right click them, and select the new menu option to call them.

This allows end users to call any phone number using an application they've selected, such as Webex, despite whether or not the link is already a hyper link (tel: link) or not.
